message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we meet at $17,000?
I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is a good price for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
